name: Stage
description:
stage

by StupidDesign Entertainment

What happens if you break the relationship between a game and its player?

Your character is put on stage. A curious place which works beyond logic and it keeps getting more uncanny. On your search for reason you find a recipe for a healing potion.

For what is yours to find out.

Credits

Vanessa - Project Management, Graphics, Story

Lola - Story, Game Design, Graphics

Phil - (Bitbucket/Git), Unity/AC, Sound
